titleStmt.title: Clod-pate's ghost, or, A dialogue between Justice Clod-Pate and his [quondam] clerk honest Tom Ticklefoot wherein is faithfullly related all the news from purgatory, about Ireland, Langhorn, &c / the author, T.T.
titleStmt.author: Smith, Francis, fl. 1657-1689.

titleStmt.title: Clod-pate's ghost, or, A dialogue between Justice Clod-Pate and his [quondam] clerk honest Tom Ticklefoot wherein is faithfullly related all the news from purgatory, about Ireland, Langhorn, &c / the author, T.T.
titleStmt.author: Smith, Francis, fl. 1657-1689.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Francis Smith. cf. NUC pre-1956, Wing (CD-ROM, 1996), and LCNAF.
Imprint information from text; dated on p. 12: Aug. 25, 1679.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
